How To Get Thailand Students Visa. Here we will show you the simple ways you can get a Thailand student Visa very fast without much waste of time.

1. Contact the Embassy

The first step is to contact the embassy to show interest in getting your student visa

2. Fix An Appointment

After you might have finished reaching out to the embassy, you can fix an appointment with them

3. Submit all document

You are required to submit all your documents which will list in the requirement book the embassy with giving to you.

You can submit the document in person and if you can’t do it in person, you have to submit it through the post office in an enclosed envelope

After your Visa has been processed and approved, you will be required to travel to Thailand in the provided time written in the Visa if not, it will expire.

Frequently Ask Questions – FAQ

How much does cost for Thailand Students Visa?

For you to be granted a Visa, you will have to pay the visa application fee of 2000 Thai Baht which is equivalent to $65 or €60.

The price might change depending on the local currency you are using.

How do I pay for Thailand Students Visa?

Some embassy might need to pay in cash while others would want it paid in Bank order or online payment.

Can I work in Thailand with Student Visa?

It is not possible to work in Thailand with a student Visa, if you are going to work there, you have to be given a work permit and work Visa.

Can I apply for Visa Extension?

Your Visa is supposed to last for the time you are to study, if the time is about to elapse and you want to stay longer, you can pay for your Visa to be extended.

How to Pay for Thailand Student Visa

There are two major ways you can do this and we would take them one after the other.

Method 1: Through the Embassy

The embassy can be of good assistance to you if you wish to pay their cash, you just go there, collect the form, fill and pay for it. It is as simple as that.

Method 2: Pay Online

If your going to pay for the Visa fee online, it means you will be paying with either your Mastercard or Visacard, either way, you will be debited online.

Note: when you are done filling out the form, take a copy of the filled form because it is one of the things that will be needed if your going for your interview.

After submission of your Visa application form, you can then fix an appointment.

Requirement For Thailand Student Visa

  • International passport
  • letter of admission from the school
  • letter of approval from the ministry of education
  • two passport photographs
  • Financial Statement
  • Note from the security agency of your country
  • pay for your Visa application.
